column1: Today marks 107 years of Delta Sigma Theta.   Standing alongside my sorority sisters all these years has reminded me of our solidarity and friendship. Happy Founder’s Day to my beloved sisters of Delta Sigma Theta Sorority  Inc. https://t.co/bnlFakzdJ6

Thank you Team Lucy.   Thanks to your support we exceeded all of our 2019 goals. Our campaign to win #GA06 again in 2020 is in strong shape for a November rematch with @karenhandel.   We accomplished so much in 2019 but there's so much left to do. Let's get to work in 2020.

You’ve stood by me in 2019 in the face of attacks by @FoxNews @nrcc the @NRA and @TeamTrump. You've helped me fight back with grassroots power.   Thank you.   Can you help one more time before our midnight FEC deadline?   Here's the best link to donate: https://t.co/k4yzpDGZpa https://t.co/4J73AxDxgs

🚨 We’re still $3162.55 short of our 2019 fundraising goal 🚨   @KarenHandel is raking in maximum donations and special interest $ before this deadline and we need to keep up.   If you can spare $10 I could really use your help hitting our goal tonight. https://t.co/889zJGs1fb

We have so much work to do in 2020:  🔵 DEFEAT @karenhandel again ✅ WIN 2 Senate races in GA  🗣 PRESSURE the Senate to pass gun safety reforms ❌ FIGHT voter disenfranchisement  Can you chip in $10 before our end-of-year deadline to help make it happen?  https://t.co/t5LzybTGW9

We accomplished things that folks thought were impossible in 2019.   Our gun safety movement made great strides. We are now stronger than ever.   But we’re not close to done heading into 2020.   Donate to fuel our gun safety movement: https://t.co/bL8gf2yrCG

I am praying for my dear friend John Lewis.  This may be a new fight - but I know that we will soon add this to the long list of things he has overcome.   We need his leadership now more than ever. I stand with you my friend. https://t.co/n8chCdvWzw
Merry Christmas and happy holidays from my family to you and yours!
Happy Hanukkah to all observing. May you find peace and may you enjoy the season in the company of friends and family.

📺📺WATCH THE VIDEO BELOW⬇️⬇️  This is happening now. @realDonaldTrump’s campaign staged a protest at my office. They even bussed in protestors and organizers.  I refuse to be intimidated I will do what is right. Please contribute to help me fight back: https://t.co/vdPWChTQPt https://t.co/JVHwjZudaE

This is hard work and our gun safety movement is making tangible progress.  Jordan although you are not here to see it we are winning this fight. For you and for all the families who deserve safer communities -- we will win.  https://t.co/Mk73LJ1eSA

🗣🔊 Last time @DonaldJTrumpJr called me out and attacked us in October we turned it back on @TeamTrump & hundreds of folks chipped in with an avg donation of $26.   Can we go bigger this time? Here's the link to donate. Pitch in $26 or whatever you can: https://t.co/14MADum16V https://t.co/AfqrcAqMxB

Today I'm solemnly remembering the children and adults we lost in the #SandyHook shooting their families are in my thoughts and prayers.   I'm more committed than ever to winning our gun safety fight. We must pass federal gun safety reform. We can't wait for another 7 years.

RACE UPDATE in #GA06: With it looking increasingly likely that @mtgreenee will drop out we're gearing up for a rematch in 2020 with @KarenHandel.  I need your help to guarantee we can hold onto this tossup seat. Donate to help me build a winning campaign: https://t.co/9AwDUSXynO

@karenhandel I only beat career politician @karenhandel by 1% in 2018 and @realdonaldtrump won our district by 1.5% in 2016.  2020 is shaping up to be just as close and I need your help.   Sign up for #TeamLucy to volunteer at https://t.co/RJBsSqLDVd.
National Republicans and Freedom Caucus members want @karenhandel as my opponent for one huge reason -- she's the most extreme conservative in the race against me in #GA06. https://t.co/4jxPqEPyAG

We are working hard in Washington every day. These attacks by @GaRepublicans aren't true and we need to make sure they don't go without a response.   The best way you can help is to contribute to my re-election campaign. Donate here➡️ https://t.co/NFv5N0yVir https://t.co/DUmbZdgQ8E

Only 5 hours left to hit our November fundraising goal and here’s the latest update from my finance director. We're 95.3% of the way there.   Can you help us get to 100%?   Donate here before midnight: https://t.co/S6ZS5mqLpx https://t.co/KuMJIdqQsW

There’s less 10 hours left to hit our November end-of-month goal before midnight and we still have 7% left to raise. If you’ve got any “leftovers” in your budget could you help us fill the last “slice” of this pie chart?  Donate here: https://t.co/2LPozojMVw https://t.co/U8hNbpytq4

And most importantly: Volunteer for donate to and vote for candidates in 2020 who promise to do something about our gun violence epidemic and who promise to stand up to the  @NRA.   We are going to win this fight. We cannot afford to lose. https://t.co/d4dxyeiaca

7 years after Jordan’s death our fight is not over and I need you to play a part in our movement folks.   FOLLOW and SUPPORT orgs doing the work like: @Ribbons4Jaime @MaurasVoice @bradybuzz @giffordscourage @Everytown  @MomsDemand @AMarch4OurLives and @MFOLGeorgia. https://t.co/z2neM4CaZA

And now I’m taking on the fight for gun safety reform in Congress. The American people stand with us in this fight. They deserve action.   In 2019 we’ve already had more mass shootings in America than there are days in the year.  https://t.co/AhmunFz9nX

We’ve fought dangerous Stand Your Ground laws in states around the country.   We won a historic election in 2018 in a district where no Democrat had reached 40% in the general election in 20 years.  https://t.co/40ZBDe1AUr
As each Black Friday goes by I deeply mourn Jordan’s death.   But I take time to reflect on the process we have made.   https://t.co/dX9w9IP3oy

I recall my statement on the stand to my son's killer:   “There will be no graduation daughter-in-law or future generation for us. I too must be willing to forgive and so I choose to forgive you for taking my son’s life. I pray that God has mercy on your soul.” https://t.co/kXDnociteC

Today is an especially hard time for my family. In 2012 on Black Friday my son Jordan was shot and killed.   I always spend this time of the year in deep reflection. I think about my son my faith and my family.   [1/x] https://t.co/hqgHNJ0YhK

Happy Thanksgiving to you and your family! In 2019 I'm thankful for my campaign staff volunteers donors and all of you who follow and support our common-sense gun safety movement. https://t.co/E25UqNaLBm

Jordan I want you to know I am working to carry out your legacy.   We thought you would one day fight for change -- and now together we are carrying out that vision.   Seven years later you still inspire me every single day. I miss you. I love you so much.  - Mom https://t.co/nTjR85XzPg

In the aftermath of your death I did not know how to deal with my grief.   I prayed for guidance to find a new path forward.   Then I knew what I had to do. I knew what WE had to do.   We would fight to make sure no other families would have to suffer this pain.  [4/x] https://t.co/OTdIRWL1el

You and your friends were at a gas station putting gas into your car.   Without warning a man confronted you and opened fire. He shot 10 rounds into the car and sped away.  I didn’t get to hug and kiss you goodbye. You were 17 years old. My heart is still broken.  [3/x] https://t.co/lR2dIueLJ7

Seven years ago today it was Black Friday in 2012. I was relaxing with our family at home after Thanksgiving.   That afternoon you were headed to the mall to buy presents for your friends.   [2/x] https://t.co/d5S8kmXAyK

Today marks seven years after my son Jordan was shot for playing his music.   This is always the hardest day of the year for me. So this year I want to share a letter I wrote to my son.   Dear Jordan:  [1/x] https://t.co/wsxbNQ0vNV

@realDonaldTrump Here's what @DonaldJTrumpJr's girlfriend @kimguilfoyle  had to say at the rally:   "The state of Georgia loves President Trump... Don’t believe the fake news. No president has done more for American women than President Trump... We’re just getting started."

The @realdonaldtrump campaign held a rally in my district last night. They asked if women in #GA06 were "tired of winning?"   Who won the last election here? 👀👀👀   If I'm going to win again in 2020 I'll need your help: https://t.co/GPo6yX1I74   https://t.co/gJJdtjyCRH
Thank you so much @fred_guttenberg. We are in this fight together. https://t.co/HY8zB1GCMG

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 @infowars (10/10) This is what we're up against in 2020 and we cannot lose the progress we've made on gun safety.   If @karenhandel or @mtgreenee take back #GA06 -- all of our work will be undone.  Can you chip $10 or $20 right now to help me get re-elected? https://t.co/lU2Jes4IjL

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 @infowars (9/10) Greene is funding her anti-immigrant anti-LGTBQ anti-gun safety rhetoric with a $500000 personal loan she made to her campaign. @mtgreenee will say anything and spend anything to defeat our gun safety movement. #GreeneFacts  https://t.co/GSrSD5X8mO

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 @infowars (8/10) After the worst mass shooting in our country's history in Las Vegas @mtgreenee spread conspiracy theories that the shooting was engineered by gun safety advocates. This type of dangerous rhetoric has no place in our politics. #GreeneFacts  https://t.co/urWXOvhTYp

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 (7/10) @mtgreenee has built her MAGA-based online following by spreading right-wing conspiracy theories and filming stunt videos. She has documented ties to  @infowars and other far-right extremist groups. #GreeneFacts  https://t.co/ND0IlpZNkQ

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 (6/10) My other opponent @mtgreenee is almost as extreme as @karenhandel.   Marjorie Taylor Greene is an "internet provocateur" who first gained an online following by harassing teenage Parkland survivor @davidhogg111 and posting it on Youtube. #GreeneFacts https://t.co/n5J5ztFRdI
@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 (5/10) And @karenhandel‘s views on the LGBTQ+ community are despicable -- Handel is wrong for Georgians. #HandelFacts  https://t.co/fhN3ihkOHL

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 (4/10) It is well known that as Georgia Secretary of State from 2007-10 @karenhandel engineered Georgia's voter suppression scheme and paved the way for Gov. Brian Kemp's abuse of the office. #HandelFacts  https://t.co/hSj6u0dmcu

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 (3/10) @karenhandel also tried to de-fund Planned Parenthood during her time working at the Susan G. Komen Foundation -- and she resigned in disgrace after the backlash. #HandelFacts  https://t.co/sSwXMpsiTD

@karenhandel @mtgreenee @davidhogg111 (2/10) @karenhandel is too extreme to ever represent #GA06 again. She unsuccessfully ran for office over and over and over again then got to Congress and immediately voted to throw doctors in jail for performing abortions. #HandelFacts  https://t.co/3bKVArbsow

2 of my Republican opponents just dropped out leaving the most EXTREME challengers running: @karenhandel (known for her anti-choice views) & @mtgreenee (famous for publicly harassing @davidhogg111).  I need your help to keep them far away from Congress: https://t.co/wTCFMVJ8Wb

Republicans just made a $7 million ad buy to attack me and other vulnerable Dems on our support for the impeachment inquiry.   So I'm asking personally: Can you help me fight back by building a rapid response fund? Donate $7 right now: https://t.co/t4OmnTYD4L https://t.co/eK23PtTBWT

Friday at Saugus HS: 2 students killed 3 injured.  Last night in Fresno: 4 dead 6 injured.   Today at an Oklahoma Walmart: 3 dead several injured.   Our country is reeling. Enough is enough.   The Senate must summon some courage & act now on gun safety reforms we've passed.

I appreciate your #GunSafety support @TedDeutch.   Santa Clarita is the latest tragedy that Senate Republicans will no doubt ignore. There is blood on their hands.   I am a mother on a mission and our gun safety movement will win. Donate here: https://t.co/RlKhN8hJ6m https://t.co/Iu1tfiOo8g

Last night I was proud to speak before @BillClinton at the Brady Action Awards. I stand with @bradybuzz to honor 25 years of the Brady Bill and the commitment to end gun violence. #Bradyat25 #TakeActionNotSides https://t.co/Yiz6XZ8nc3
Today in the Senate as the school shooting in Santa Clarita was unfolding my colleague Senator @ChrisMurphyCT tried to ask for a vote on #HR8. The GOP blocked it.  https://t.co/I4aTxlAVPQ

My heart goes out to Santa Clarita.  Just a few weeks after I spoke with @senatemajldr about gun safety we are faced with yet another tragic shooting. Blood is on our hands in Congress -- and we must act.   We can prevent these tragedies. The Senate must hold a vote on #HR8.

We CAN and we WILL flip Georgia blue in 2020.   Suburban areas like my district are going to tip the scales. We need to hold #GA06 and flip #GA07 next year to win statewide.   To help continue building our movement invest here with a grassroots donation: https://t.co/C6mmhK0vOg https://t.co/DolGD6Eiw5

Today we recognize the courage and honor the sacrifice of service members and veterans across America. We also recognize their families who have often given up so much in service of protecting our freedom. https://t.co/0es5wvqqaQ

We have to send a message to @realDonaldTrump. He just raised $3.5 million to prop up vulnerable GA Republicans and we have to respond.    Will you make a grassroots contribution right now to put Trump on notice that we're flipping GA blue in 2020?   https://t.co/aKQhNbUHtt https://t.co/bWSrrmUX59

Today is the official one year anniversary of our win over @karenhandel in 2018 by just 1% (it took a few extra days to call the election).   We've got to work twice as hard for the same result in 2020 and I need your help. Can you pitch in $5 or $10? https://t.co/vp2eBgteB3 https://t.co/CfWCjbIOBu

@karenhandel By no means is our fight over it's only beginning but tonight I want you to remember that feeling of victory we tasted one year ago.  What else do you remember from election night 2018 in #GA06? (6/6)

@karenhandel And I remember feeling thankful for all of you. I could not have won #GA06 without your help. Because you invested in me and my story we flipped a seat that was held by a Republican by over 30 years! And I am able to speak out loudly for gun safety reforms in Congress. (5/x)

@karenhandel I remember... the next morning our campaign team beginning to prepare for the possibility of a long and drawn-out recount which thankfully we were able to avoid when more votes were counted and @karenhandel graciously conceded 48 hours later. (4/x)

@karenhandel I remember... going to bed thinking there was a big chance we had lost the race in #GA06 since we were down about 1000 votes as the clock approached midnight. Then waking up at three in the morning to a frantic phone call -- now we were up a few hundred votes! (3/x)

I remember thinking... was all of the work we just put in enough to win? What happens to this movement -- and our fight for gun safety -- if we lose? And as the vote totals were tabulated for @karenhandel and myself #GA06 was looking like it would come down to the wire. (2/x)

Do you remember election night in 2018 one year ago tonight? I certainly do... As I walked into a room full of family friends and supporters I remember thinking... What if my son Jordan was here to see this? To see how he'd inspired me and all of us? (1/x)

We spend today remembering and celebrating Maura’s life. Her legacy lives on today and forever.   Follow @MaurasVoice and let’s recommit to the fight for gun safety.   We have so much work left to do.

One year ago today Maura Binkley a Dunwoody resident was killed in a hate-fueled Florida shooting.  Her parents Jeff and Margaret created @MaurasVoice to advocate for gun laws that could have prevented her death. https://t.co/K2ObrqOZhq
Happy Halloween! https://t.co/YEHXYEmTSV

I’m already being attacked for my vote today in support of the impeachment inquiry.   @KarenHandel has called me crazy and said impeachment is a scam.  Can I count on your support to beat Handel again in 2020 and keep this seat?    Donate here: https://t.co/dedHtpDh8x https://t.co/vLg29hKmUl

Fortunately the courts are upholding women's rights around the country.   A federal court overturned Georgia's extreme abortion ban earlier this month.  We will never stop the fight to protect Roe v. Wade in Washington. https://t.co/ZZsOdwzsJL

Ms. Meadows -- as the President of the NRA you want my seat in #GA06 back but we're not going to let you take it.   So I'm asking: Please make a grassroots contribution to stand with me and defend this seat against the NRA➡️ https://t.co/PEUQPBlXmQ

And since I was elected we have passed historic gun safety reform in the House of Representatives all while being continuously attacked by the NRA and their new President Carolyn Meadows.   https://t.co/sSt2I2nq28

As a mom my instincts led me to stand up to the gun lobby to demand safety for my neighbors and justice for my son.   Our government should listen to our citizens. If our current elected officials wouldn't do it I decided to stand up and do it myself.    https://t.co/40ZBDe1AUr

This weekend the NRA President said: "Either we will prevail with Trump... or if the Democrats triumph America as we’ve known will vanish.”   Ma'am with all due respect my son was ripped from my life 7 years ago because of the laws you support (1/x).   https://t.co/rPbY4mtdhB

We already have a troubling history of voter suppression in Georgia. We cannot allow this disenfranchisement to continue unchecked.   We must have more rigorous procedures to make sure no voter arrives at the polls to find out they've been unregistered.  https://t.co/T11ELslmvw

Karen Handel is using extreme right-wing talking points to attack me over my support of the impeachment inquiry.  I only won #GA06 by 1% in 2018 without President Trump on the ballot.   I need your help to make sure we beat her again in 2020. Donate here: https://t.co/quypfL3ivT https://t.co/5NowjvFctc

October has been full of protests at my offices by the Tea Party & the Trump Campaign.   I took a risk to support the impeachment inquiry in #GA06 b/c I believe the American people deserve the truth.  Can you donate $10 to help me hold this swing seat:    https://t.co/VaStYOiAff https://t.co/FfU27JpMfM

It's a new era y'all. #GA06 -- my district (!!) -- was held by Speaker Gingrich from 1979-1999.   Georgia continues to change rapidly -- and with your help we can make our state a battleground in 2020.   Donate to help us lead the fight to flip GA BLUE: https://t.co/gMdXaSdgGe https://t.co/QYqeHdJuWs

After Parkland I decided to run for Congress because we were not making progress on gun safety.   I'm disappointed about this news but it does show that our gun safety movement is making progress in Washington.   We can and we will pass laws to make our families safer. https://t.co/EdToTi9o0C

Rep. Elijah Cummings was never afraid to speak truth to power.   He showed up time after time to fight for gun safety side by side with advocates.  We have lost a true friend and we'll miss him dearly. https://t.co/CYrW1i2qb9

Let there be no doubt our movement is grassroots powered.   93% of our donations for the 3rd Quarter for our re-election campaign were $100 or under.   So whether you contributed $1 $10 $20 or any amount thank you so much for your support. https://t.co/0tx6URxCxc

@karenhandel (4/x) Lately Handel has been trying to win back votes by changing her tune.   We will not be fooled by a flip-flopping career politician. I will continue to stand up for what is right.   https://t.co/uLJFmvu6Xs

@karenhandel (3/x) Handel has stated on the record that she believes gay couples shouldn’t be allowed to adopt children.   When pressed further by a reporter she offered a simple explanation: “Because I don’t.”  https://t.co/nbklyDZ6zp

@karenhandel (2/x) - To put it kindly Karen Handel has an awful track record when it comes to LGBTQ rights.   In 2017 she laughed at a question about gay marriage. She said "Why is marriage between one man and one woman? Are you serious?"   https://t.co/fhN3ihkOHL

I hugged so many people along the parade route who shared their stories with me.   Some even became emotional as they talked about how monumental it is that we voted out @karenhandel in 2018.    I stand with the LGBTQ community and I will call out politicians who do not. (1/x) https://t.co/H8n3TZpuwo

We had such a great time yesterday at the Atlanta Pride Parade. It was such a joy to give and receive so many hugs smiles and fist bumps.   I'll continue to fight for the LGBTQ community in Washington every day - like I fight for gun safety pro-choice values and our families. https://t.co/i3ruPyxxPG
On National Coming Out Day know that I stand in support of the LGBTQ community.   Whether you are out yet or not I am working on your behalf in Washington.

President Trump and his son are attacking me because I voted for the impeachment inquiry.   Yesterday they bussed folks to my office in #GA06 to protest.  I refuse to be intimidated I will do what is right. Please contribute to help me fight back:  https://t.co/uE3K3LVFyZ https://t.co/XVPRBsT84L

The national Trump campaign recruited people to protest today at my office. Two thoughts.   1. It’s Sandy Springs - not Atlanta. Welcome to #GA06.   2. I will do right by my district and my constituents - no matter what. https://t.co/cGp2IBvFwH
G’mar Chatima Tovah to our Jewish community members.   As you observe the holiest day of the year Yom Kippur the Day of Atonement we wish you an easy fast and a meaningful day of reflection.

Good news -- Governor Kemp's extreme abortion ban in GA won't go into effect on 1/1/20 but we have to keep defending Roe v. Wade here and in Washington D.C.    We'll keep fighting until every woman can make her own reproductive healthcare decisions.  https://t.co/VEt4HLMRBZ

🚨ALERT🚨 The GOP is up with a new ad attacking me. This ad is targeted at voters in #GA06.  They're relying on big money to keep this ad running. I'm relying on you to help me fight back:   https://t.co/U94YG9YieL https://t.co/iVyU3xB26K

2 hours left. Less than $1000 away from our $20K end-of-quarter fundraising goal.   Republicans haven't stopped their attacks since I voted to begin impeachment inquiry 2 weeks ago. I need your help even if it's just $5 or $10!  Donate here: https://t.co/fChmVR7Nfy

Team -- we have just over 5 hours left and $1183.75 left to hit our end-of-quarter goal.   I'm only asking because hitting this goal really matters -- can you give $5 or $10 right now to help us make it before 11:59PM?   DONATE: https://t.co/AsT5NYOMyB https://t.co/VsDD7ka9Yk
Wishing a sweet new year to the Jewish community in GA06 and across the country. Happy #RoshHashanah and l'shana tova!

Team -- we only have 36 hours left until our quarterly deadline.   If you haven't pitched in yet and want to be counted on our public report I could really use your help.   DONATE HERE: https://t.co/k3LaYSc3Ij https://t.co/K6YINREMjk

They already have. And look at what they're doing to my colleague @JoeCunninghamSC and his wife. It's disgusting and it has no place in our politics.  Let's use this to teach the @NRCC a lesson. Are you angry? Chip in $25 to help Joe and I fight back:  https://t.co/GnDvNWdTRP https://t.co/mTbfjgtrrk

ICYMI here's my full statement I emailed out yesterday on the impeachment inquiry.   Republicans are continuing the name calling & attacks: "Lying Lucy" "coward" "deranged"... it goes on and on.  If you can donate I need you to stand with me: https://t.co/C9MtmDT5uq https://t.co/e92x0YPLzw

These are challenging times for our country and our democratic process can be frustrating.   But we can't change that process without getting involved.   I got involved when I ran for Congress. How will you get involved?   Sign up to join Team Lucy here: https://t.co/RJBsSqLDVd

Two weeks ago I voted to begin the impeachment inquiry because I believe Americans deserve to have ALL the facts.   Since National Republicans have come after me and I need your help to keep this seat.  https://t.co/dI7WmrbVev

@splcenter We are in a political age where my opponents feel empowered to make horrific statements while running against me because of who I am and what I stand for.  I know that our country is better than this and I need you to help me fight back. Donate here:    https://t.co/rtby8V617I

@splcenter Another one of my opponents declared he is a self-identified "White Nationalist."  He has also said that Muslims in Congress “don’t look like Americans” and recently pronounced himself the “Martin Luther King for white people.”  https://t.co/0AoJPd20mZ
One of my opponents in #GA06 was recently flagged by @splcenter's HateWatch for her close ties to extremists on the right.  https://t.co/ND0IlpZNkQ

I’m concerned about the extremism going on in my re-election race.   My opponents in #GA06 have known ties to extremists and one has self-identified as a "White Nationalist."  Will you chip a grassroots donation to stand with me in the face of hate?  https://t.co/0DtxW5bFKn

Glad to hear the candidates talk about the intricacies of our common-sense gun safety movement. This conversation wasn't happening four years ago.   @NRA we are winning this fight -- and we won't stop until we end our American #gunviolence epidemic.

I was proud to support the Never Forget the Heroes Act to provide support to the first responders survivors and families of the attacks on the Twin Towers. Their bravery can not and will not be forgotten.

Today marks 18 years since our nation was changed forever. I remember the 2996 innocent lives lost on September 11 2001 and I pledge to continue to honor their legacies and the sacrifices of our first responders.

Republicans continue to attack survivors of gun violence when we advocate for gun safety. Now they're telling @ShuttleCDRKelly they'll stop him "dead in his tracks."  @GabbyGiffords continues to be a friend and inspiration to us all. This is sickening.   https://t.co/k6PMF5YGgB

Thank you to everyone who has stood with me and donated to my campaign last night in the face of more baseless attacks and character smears by Republicans.   If you'd also like to support our movement for gun safety in Congress here's the best link:   https://t.co/QvznRm3E5D https://t.co/3MSpdzBpxY

Advocating for gun safety is not "disgusting" @NRCC. What is “disgusting” is that my teenage son was killed for listening to loud music.  People are investing in our movement because they know we will make meaningful changes in Washington.   Invest here: https://t.co/dyc0rZ1UQV https://t.co/PIJBQWdV5d

National Republicans continue to accuse me of "politicizing a mass shooting" in the effort to keep our families safe.  My son was shot and killed in 2012 and I will not apologize for leading the fight on gun safety.  You can support my campaign here: https://t.co/bNBNohJCcz https://t.co/4N62wOFTOA

Thank you for listening to Americans who overwhelmingly favor gun safety @Walmart.  I hope the Senate will listen to Walmart CEO Doug McMillon's words when Congress reconvenes: "It's clear to us that the status quo is unacceptable." https://t.co/VLtzXpdiK3

Happy Labor Day!  Today we honor the sacrifices of the men and women who fought for workers' rights.  Paid time off Social Security and a 40-hour work week. Without their advocacy and organizing we wouldn't have these benefits we take for granted. https://t.co/aPWWPilcet
Every single day our legislators refuse to act our communities are at risk.   Our communities and our families deserve better. We MUST act.
Every shooting means families will never be the same.
Every shooting means a community is forever altered.
It’s time to act. https://t.co/7hub9Ehslp

We're so close to hitting our August goal!   Can you be one of the last few grassroots donors who pushes us over the top before midnight?   Donate here: https://t.co/wpHOQWitEc https://t.co/7gXiIS154v
#TeamLucy is a growing movement and family. Want to get involved? Click here to find out about events and volunteer opportunities in your area: https://t.co/RJBsSqLDVd

I refuse to apologize to National Republicans for calling out my opponents when they respond to mass shootings with the same tired talking points.   Our communities need someone who will stand up for gun violence victims and I plan on continuing to be that person in Washington.

Now I wake up every single day fighting for my son and the countless others who we have lost to our American gun violence epidemic.   And I fight tooth and nail for laws that can make our communities safer.

Then in 2012 my 17-year-old son was senselessly murdered by a man with a gun at a gas station.   Our nation’s dangerous gun laws are the reason that I was never able to take senior prom pictures and graduation pictures or send Jordan off to college.
I never could have imagined I would be serving in Congress.   When I was a flight attendant I always made sure to get home every night to see my son Jordan.   He was the joy of my life.

National Republicans are now accusing me of "politicizing a tragedy."  Let’s get something straight: I lost my only son to gun violence. I now dedicate all of my love for Jordan towards our fight for gun safety.   Donate to help me continue this fight: https://t.co/yixDmDA7OW https://t.co/kkfgaAasKX
